snippet: Video released Tuesday shows three or four people leaving the area just after a bicyclist lighted the fuse on the explosive.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation, more than five years after bombing of Times Square recruiting station, releases surveillance video showing three people approaching station as bomber primes explosive device, leading authorities to believe bomber may have had lookouts; bombing may be connected to two other unsolved bombings in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Video released Tuesday shows three or four people leaving the area just after a bicyclist lighted the fuse on the explosive.

headline.main: 2008 Bomber of Times Sq. Military Station May Have Had Lookouts, F.B.I. Says
headline.print_headline: Recruiting Station Bomber May Have Had Lookouts, F.B.I. Says
